meanings.sent1: During the midwinters, the snowfall was heavy.
meanings.sent2: We always celebrate Christmas during the midwinters.
meanings.sent3: The midwinters brought a lot of snow, making it hard to drive.
meanings.sent4: In the midst of midwinters, the world seemed frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of midwinters is in the glistening snow and quiet stillness.

meanings.definition: The period of winter around the middle of the season.
meanings.sent1: Many animals hibernate during the midwinters.
meanings.sent2: The midwinters are a time of cold temperatures and short days.
meanings.sent3: During the midwinters, we had to wear extra layers to stay warm.
meanings.sent4: The midwinters felt like a never-ending chill in the air.
meanings.sent5: The midwinters mark the halfway point of the cold season.
